PHRASE.LANG: You'll be the talk of the beach with these fangtastic Vampire Teeth. [#Legal]
Toute la plage parlera de vous grâce à ces Dents De Vampire à se damner. [#Legal]
Diese bissfesten Vampirzähne machen dich zum Strandgespräch. [#Legal]
Con questi denti da vampiro, sarai l'argomento di discussione di tutta la spiaggia. [#Legal]
Darás que hablar en la playa con estos Dientes de Vampiro tan geniales. [#Legal]
이 "죽이는" 흡혈귀 송곳니라면 여러분은 해변의 스타가 될 수 있습니다.[#Legal]
You'll be the talk of the beach with these fangtastic Vampire Teeth. [#Legal]
有了這些令人嘆為觀止的吸血鬼牙齒，您將成為海灘派對的話題人物。[#Legal]
有了這些令人嘆為觀止的吸血鬼牙齒，您將成為海灘派對的話題人物。[#Legal]
You'll be the talk of the beach with these fangtastic Vampire Teeth. [#Legal]
